author: Christopher Tran <pfftdammitchris@gmail.com>
description: NOODL is a language based from the YAML AST. This library gives you the tools to build JavaScript applications with it
name: noodl

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -r ts-node/register --extensions ts --file src/setupTests.ts --watch --watch-files src "src/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test:file: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha --extensions ts --watch --watch-files src
